text: "Squeeze Me In" is a song by American country music artist Garth Brooks. It was released in February 2, 2002 as the second single from his eighth studio album Scarecrow. ==Music video== The music video was directed by Jon Small and premiered in early 2002. It is a live performance video. It debuted at number 19 on CMT's Top 20 Countdown for the week of March 8, 2002. ==References== Category:2002 songs Category:Garth Brooks songs
title: Squeeze Me In
